entry.title: [GRA][Webhosting] - Network slowness
entry.content:
Jul 19, 12:40 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 18/07/2022 09:00 UTC
End Time : 19/07/2022 12:30 UTC

Jul 19, 09:29 UTC
Monitoring - UPDATE: We observed there is stability now. Our technical team continue to investigate the situation. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Jul 18, 13:14 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are investigating the root cause of the problem.
There is a certainty that the problem is a network problem.
We will keep you updated on the progression of the status of the incident.

Jul 18, 10:16 UTC
Update - Our first investigation allowed us to identify the impacted clusters: Cluster020, Cluster021, Cluster023, Cluster025, Cluster026, Cluster027, Cluster028, Cluster029, Cluster030, Cluster031

Jul 18, 10:13 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 18/07/2022 09:00 UTC
Service impact : We observe network slowdowns impacting the hosting of websites
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams investigate with the network teams to determine the origin of the degradation

entry.title: [All][Voip] - T53w
entry.content:
Jul 12, 14:15 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/07/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 12/07/2022 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Some T53w failed to upgrade.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. Impacted T53w are working as prior the incident.

Jul 12, 09:25 UTC
Update - Update :T53w needs a manual reboot to retrieve the new provisioning parameters. Please restart your phone by unplugging/replugging the power supply or PoE access, T53w will restart with the previous firmware version.

Jul 12, 08:15 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/07/2022 20:00UTC
Service impact : Some T53w failed to upgrade after this task https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/d3npvdv6hpcr. Phones are stucked at 90% of the upgrade process.
Ongoing actions : We are updating our provisioning scripts.

entry.title: [GRA][Webhosting] - Manager web statistics
entry.content:
Jul 11, 14:31 UTC
Resolved - Start Time :11/07/2022 07:00 UTC
End Time : 11/07/2022 14:20 UTC
Root cause : There was an issue with the load balancer to the metric read backend. The load balancer was switched to use a new read backend.

Jul 11, 14:08 UTC
Update - UPDATE: Our technical team have corrected the errors internally and on the API. Work still in progress to bring the service back in order.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

Jul 11, 09:00 UTC
Identified - Start time : 11/07/2022 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Access to web statistics on all hosted websites not available
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : GRA
Scope of impact : All on clusters
Our technical teams are working on resolving the issue. Updates will be post as significant progress is made.
